script.name: plugin.blacklist.menu
script.sourceplaintext:
$ICON = 148 $current.profile = get global variable: name='bl.menu.profile' $table.races = get global variable: name='egosoft.races' $blacklst.profiles = get global variable: name='egosoft.bl.profiles' $DEFINE.ALLOWWHITELIST = [TRUE]
if $a.state == 'start' if $a.obj -> exists if $a.value == 'blacklist' gosub sub.SelectProfileMenu return $input end end
gosub sub.FindRaces gosub sub.BuildMenu return $input
else if $a.state == 'text' $read.text = read text: page=[Page.CmdConsole] id=138 $read.text = sprintf: fmt='%s:', $read.text, null, null, null, null if is datatype[ $a.obj ] == DATATYPE_ARRAY set global variable: name='bl.menu.objs' value=$a.obj $i = size of array $a.obj $ship = get first item in array: $a.obj $blacklist = $ship -> get local variable: name='blacklist.profile' while $i dec $i = $ship = $a.obj[$i] $value = $ship -> get local variable: name='blacklist.profile' if $blacklist != $value $blacklist = -1 break end end if $blacklist == -1 $text = read text: page=[Page.Menus] id=1102320 $text = sprintf: pageid=1907 textid=23, $text, null, null, null, null else if $blacklist $text = $blacklist else $text = read text: page=6020 id=279 end $text = create text for custom menu, left=$read.text, right=$text return $text else set global variable: name='bl.menu.objs' value=null $blacklist = $a.obj -> get local variable: name='blacklist.profile' if $blacklist $text = create text for custom menu, left=$read.text, right=$blacklist else $text = read text: page=6020 id=279 $text = create text for custom menu, left=$read.text, right=$text end return $text end
else if $a.state == [MEvent.Hotkey] $menu.id = $a.value[0] $selection = $a.value[1] $value = $a.value[2] if $menu.id == 'menu.blacklist' if $selection == 'info' if is datatype[ $value ] == DATATYPE_RACE $input = create input: id='show.info' encyclopedia page, race=$value else if is datatype[ $value ] == DATATYPE_SECTOR $input = create input: id='show.info' object info page, object=$value else if is datatype[ $value ] == DATATYPE_OBJCOMMAND $input = create input: id='show.info' encyclopedia page, command=$value end else if $selection == 'sector' if is datatype[ $value ] == DATATYPE_SECTOR $input = create input: open sector map, id='open.sector', sector=$value end else if $selection == 'galaxy' if is datatype[ $value ] == DATATYPE_SECTOR $input = create input: open galaxy map, id='open.galaxy', sector=$value end end end return $input
else if $a.state == 'add.sector' if $a.value == 1 $read.text = read text: page=6020 id=2086 $input = create input: id='add.avoid.sector', user input=Var/Sector, refobj=[PLAYERSHIP], description=$read.text, without sector=[FALSE], filterclass=null, racemask=null, flags=null, default=null else if $a.value == 2 $read.text = read text: page=6020 id=2087 $input = create input: id='add.block.sector', user input=Var/Sector, refobj=[PLAYERSHIP], description=$read.text, without sector=[FALSE], filterclass=null, racemask=null, flags=null, default=null else if $a.value == 3 $read.text = read text: page=6020 id=212 $input = create input: id='add.white.sector', user input=Var/Sector, refobj=[PLAYERSHIP], description=$read.text, without sector=[FALSE], filterclass=null, racemask=null, flags=null, default=null end return $input
else if $a.state == [MEvent.Select] $menu.id = $a.value[0] $selection = $a.value[1] if $menu.id == 'bl.delete.menu' $text = read text: page=1903 id=1019 $read.text = read text: page=1903 id=1012 $input = create input: id=$selection, message box=$text, title=$read.text, buttons=[Buttons.YesNo], icon=$ICON, default button=[Button.Yes] return $input
else if $menu.id == 'bl.select.menu' if get global variable: name='bl.menu.newcmd' set global variable: name='bl.cmd.profile' value=$selection $input = create menu return to previous menu: value=$selection return $input else $arr.objs = get global variable: name='bl.menu.objs' if $arr.objs $i = size of array $arr.objs while $i dec $i = $ship = $arr.objs[$i] if $selection == 'global.profile' $ship ->set local variable: name='blacklist.profile' value=null else $ship ->set local variable: name='blacklist.profile' value=$selection end end else if $selection == 'global.profile' $a.obj ->set local variable: name='blacklist.profile' value=null else $a.obj ->set local variable: name='blacklist.profile' value=$selection end end $input = create menu return to previous menu: value=$selection return [TRUE] end else if $selection == 'clear.sector' if $current.profile gosub sub.GetProfileData clear table $sector.table else clear sector blacklist end gosub sub.BuildMenu $input = create input return value: update menu=$menu return $input else if $selection == 'add.command' $read.text = read text: page=[Page.Menus] id=1104725 $input = create input: id='new.command', user input=Var/Ship Command, refobj=null, description=$read.text, without sector=null, filterclass=null, racemask=null, flags=[Find.Known], default=null return $input else if $selection == 'delete.profile' gosub sub.DeleteMenu return $input else if $selection == 'new.profile' $read.text = read text: page=6020 id=271 $input = create input: id='new.profile', user input=Var/String, refobj=null, description=$read.text, without sector=[FALSE], filterclass=null, racemask=null, flags=null, default=null return $input else if $selection == 'global.profile' play sample [Sound.Success] set global variable: name='bl.menu.profile' value=null $current.profile = null gosub sub.BuildMenu $input = create input return value: update menu=$menu return $input else play sample [Sound.Success] set global variable: name='bl.menu.profile' value=$selection $current.profile = $selection gosub sub.BuildMenu $input = create input return value: update menu=$menu return $input end end
else if $a.state == [MEvent.Context] $menu.id = $a.value[0] $selection = $a.value[1] $value = $a.value[2] if is datatype[ $selection ] == DATATYPE_SECTOR if $current.profile gosub sub.GetProfileData if $value == [Blacklist.None] remove key $selection from table $sector.table else $sector.table[$selection] = $value end else $selection ->set sector blacklist type: type=$value end gosub sub.BuildMenu $input = create input return value: update menu=$menu return $input else if is datatype[ $selection ] == DATATYPE_OBJCOMMAND if $value == 'delete' $table.cmds = get global variable: name='bl.cmd.link' remove key $selection from table $table.cmds gosub sub.BuildMenu $input = create input return value: update menu=$menu return $input else if $value == 'change' set global variable: name='bl.menu.newcmd' value=$selection $sub.title = ' ' gosub sub.SelectProfileMenu return $input end end
else if $a.state == [MEvent.Returned] $menu.id = $a.value[0] $selection = $a.value[1] $value = $a.value[2] if $menu.id == 'bl.delete.menu' if $value == [Button.Yes] remove key $selection from table $blacklst.profiles do if $current.profile == $selection set global variable: name='bl.menu.profile' value=null $input = create menu return to previous menu: value=$selection return $input end else if $selection == 'new.profile' if $value if not $blacklst.profiles $blacklst.profiles = table alloc set global variable: name='egosoft.bl.profiles' value=$blacklst.profiles end gosub sub.CreateProfile $blacklst.profiles[$value] = $data $current.profile = $value set global variable: name='bl.menu.profile' value=$current.profile gosub sub.BuildMenu return $menu end else if $selection == 'new.command' if $value set global variable: name='bl.menu.newcmd' value=$value $sub.title = read text: page=[Page.Menus] id=1104725 gosub sub.SelectProfileMenu return $input end else if $selection == 'bl.select.menu' $cmd = get global variable: name='bl.menu.newcmd' if $cmd set global variable: name='bl.menu.newcmd' value=null $value = get global variable: name='bl.cmd.profile' set global variable: name='bl.cmd.profile' value=null if not $value $table.cmds = get global variable: name='bl.cmd.link' if $table.cmds if $table.cmds[$cmd] return null end end $read.text = read text: page=[Page.Menus] id=1104725 $input = create input: id='new.command', user input=Var/Ship Command, refobj=null, description=$read.text, without sector=null, filterclass=null, racemask=null, flags=[Find.Known], default=null return $input else $table.cmds = get global variable: name='bl.cmd.link' if not $table.cmds $table.cmds = table alloc set global variable: name='bl.cmd.link' value=$table.cmds end $table.cmds[$cmd] = $value gosub sub.BuildMenu return $menu end end
else if $selection == 'bl.delete.menu' gosub sub.BuildMenu return $menu else if is datatype[ $value ] == DATATYPE_SECTOR gosub sub.GetProfileData if $selection == 'add.avoid.sector' if $current.profile $sector.table[$value] = [Blacklist.Avoid] else $value ->set sector blacklist type: type=[Blacklist.Avoid] end else if $selection == 'add.block.sector' if $current.profile $sector.table[$value] = [Blacklist.Block] else $value ->set sector blacklist type: type=[Blacklist.Block] end else if $selection == 'add.white.sector' if $current.profile $sector.table[$value] = [Blacklist.Whitelist] else $value ->set sector blacklist type: type=[Blacklist.Whitelist] end end gosub sub.BuildMenu return $menu end end end
else if $a.state == [MEvent.Switch] $menu.id = $a.value[0] $selection = $a.value[1] $value = $a.value[2] if $selection == 'race.blacklist' gosub sub.GetProfileData if not $current.profile set race blacklist type: type=$value else $current.profile.data[0] = $value end else if is datatype[ $selection ] == DATATYPE_RACE gosub sub.GetProfileData do if $value == 3 $value = 4 if not $current.profile set race blacklist: race=$selection, blacklist=$value else $blacklst.race.table[$selection] = $value end end gosub sub.BuildMenu return $menu
else if $a.state == [MEvent.Finished] set global variable: name='egosoft.races' value=null set global variable: name='bl.menu.profile' value=null set global variable: name='bl.menu.newcmd' value=null set global variable: name='bl.cmd.profile' value=null end
return null
sub.FindRaces: $table.races = table alloc
$x = get max sectors in x direction while $x dec $x = $y = get max sectors in y direction while $y dec $y = $sector = get sector from universe index: x=$x, y=$y skip if $sector continue $owner = $sector -> get owner race skip if $owner -> is known continue do if $owner == Player OR $owner == Unknown continue do if is fixed race: race=$owner continue $table.races[$owner] = [TRUE] end end set global variable: name='egosoft.races' value=$table.races endsub
sub.BuildMenu: gosub sub.GetProfileData $menu = create custom menu array $read.text = read text: page=35 id=1104508
if $current.profile $text = $current.profile else $text = read text: page=6020 id=279 end $read.text = read text: page=6020 id=272 $text = sprintf: fmt='%s: %s', $read.text, $text, null, null, null add non selectable menu item: $menu, text=$text
add custom menu heading to array $menu: title=$read.text $array = sort table keys: table=$table.races
$read.text = read text: page=6020 id=272 add tab to menu: $menu, text=$read.text
$values = array alloc: size=4 $read.text = read text: page=35 id=4022 $values[0] = $read.text $read.text = read text: page=35 id=4222 $values[1] = $read.text $read.text = read text: page=35 id=4221 $values[2] = $read.text $read.text = read text: page=[Page.Menus] id=1102426 $values[3] = $read.text
$read.text = read text: page=35 id=1104513 add value selection to menu: $menu, text=$read.text, value array=$values, default=$blacklist.type, return id='race.blacklist', width=80 allowtabs=[TRUE]
if $blacklist.type != [BlacklistType.Disabled] add section to custom menu: $menu
$values = array alloc: size=4 $read.text = read text: page=35 id=1104510 $values[0] = $read.text $read.text = read text: page=35 id=1104511 $values[1] = $read.text $read.text = read text: page=35 id=1104512 $values[2] = $read.text $read.text = read text: page=35 id=4222 $values[3] = $read.text $values2 = clone array: $values if $DEFINE.ALLOWWHITELIST $read.text = read text: page=35 id=1104775 $values2[3] = $read.text else remove element from array $values2 at index 3 end
$size = size of array $array $i = 0 while $i < $size $owner = $array[$i] if $current.profile $type = $blacklst.race.table[$owner] skip if $type $type = 0 else $type = get true race blacklist: race=$owner end do if $type == 4 $type = 3 if $blacklist.type == [BlacklistType.Auto] OR $blacklist.type == [Blacklist.GlobalFF] $text.col = array alloc: size=2 $text = create custom menu column string, position=0 length=150 right=[FALSE] colour=null text=$owner $text.col[0] = $text $text = $values[$type] $text = create custom menu column string, position=-1 length=100 right=[TRUE] colour=null text=$text $text.col[1] = $text set menu line option: $menu, text colour=[MenuColour.Disabled] add non selectable menu item: $menu, text=$text.col else add value selection to menu: $menu, text=$owner, value array=$values, default=$type, return id=$owner, width=80 allowtabs=[TRUE] end inc $i = end end
$read.text = read text: page=35 id=1104509 add custom menu heading to array $menu: title=$read.text $read.text = read text: page=35 id=1104514 add custom menu item to array $menu: text=$read.text nextinput='add.sector' value=1 $read.text = read text: page=35 id=1104515 add custom menu item to array $menu: text=$read.text nextinput='add.sector' value=2 if $DEFINE.ALLOWWHITELIST $read.text = read text: page=35 id=1104776 add custom menu item to array $menu: text=$read.text nextinput='add.sector' value=3 end if size of table $sector.table add section to custom menu: $menu
$array = sort table keys: table=$sector.table $i = 0 $size = size of array $array while $i < $size $sector = $array[$i] inc $i = $context = create context menu $size2 = size of array $values2 $j = 0 while $j < $size2 $text = $values2[$j] $ret = create new array, arguments=$sector, $j, null, null, null add context menu entry: menu=$context, text=$text, icon=$ICON, returnvalue=$j, hotkey=null, disabled=[FALSE] inc $j = end $ret = create menu return value: context menu, id=$sector, menu=$context, dynamic=[FALSE] $text.col = array alloc: size=2 $text = create custom menu column string, position=0 length=150 right=[FALSE] colour=null text=$sector $text.col[0] = $text $value = $sector.table[$sector] $text = $values2[$value] $text = create custom menu column string, position=-1 length=50 right=[TRUE] colour=null text=$text $text.col[1] = $text add custom menu item to array $menu: text=$text.col returnvalue=$ret end
add section to custom menu: $menu $ret = create menu return value: callback, value='clear.sector' $read.text = read text: page=35 id=1104516 add custom menu item to array $menu: text=$read.text returnvalue=$ret end
$read.text = read text: page=1903 id=101 add tab to menu: $menu, text=$read.text
$ret = create menu return value: callback, value='global.profile' if not $current.profile set menu line option: $menu, selection colour=[MenuColour.Green] set menu line option: $menu, text colour=[MenuColour.Green] end $read.text = read text: page=6020 id=279 add custom menu item to array $menu: text=$read.text returnvalue=$ret
if $blacklst.profiles if size of table $blacklst.profiles add section to custom menu: $menu
$sorted.array = sort table keys: table=$blacklst.profiles $size = size of array $sorted.array $i = 0 while $i < $size $profile = $sorted.array[$i] inc $i =
if $current.profile == $profile set menu line option: $menu, selection colour=[MenuColour.Green] set menu line option: $menu, text colour=[MenuColour.Green] end $ret = create menu return value: callback, value=$profile add custom menu item to array $menu: text=$profile returnvalue=$ret end end end
add section to custom menu: $menu $text = read text: page=6020 id=278 $text = sprintf: fmt='[%s]', $text, null, null, null, null $ret = create menu return value: callback, value='new.profile' add custom menu item to array $menu: text=$text returnvalue=$ret
if $blacklst.profiles if size of table $blacklst.profiles $ret = create menu return value: callback, value='delete.profile' $text = read text: page=1903 id=1012 add custom menu item to array $menu: text=$text returnvalue=$ret end end
$read.text = read text: page=6020 id=2054 add tab to menu: $menu, text=$read.text $ret = create menu return value: callback, value='add.command' $text = read text: page=1903 id=1012 $text = read text: page=[Page.Menus] id=1104725 add custom menu item to array $menu: text=$text returnvalue=$ret
$table.cmds = get global variable: name='bl.cmd.link' if $table.cmds if size of table $table.cmds $text.col = array alloc: size=2 $text = read text: page=[Page.Menus] id=1104724 $text = create custom menu column string, position=0 length=200 right=[FALSE] colour=null text=$text $text.col[0] = $text $text = read text: page=[Page.Menus] id=1104723 $text = create custom menu column string, position=-1 length=100 right=[TRUE] colour=null text=$text $text.col[1] = $text add custom menu heading to array $menu: title=$text.col
$sorted.array = sort table keys: table=$table.cmds $i = 0 $size = size of array $sorted.array while $i < $size $cmd = $sorted.array[$i] inc $i = $text.col = array alloc: size=2 $text = get command name: command=$cmd $text = create custom menu column string, position=0 length=200 right=[FALSE] colour=null text=$text $text.col[0] = $text $text = $table.cmds[$cmd] do if $text == 'global.profile' $text = read text: page=6020 id=279 $text = sprintf: fmt='[%s]', $text, null, null, null, null $text = create custom menu column string, position=-1 length=100 right=[TRUE] colour=null text=$text $text.col[1] = $text $context.menu = create context menu $text = read text: page=[Page.Menus] id=1104673 add context menu entry: menu=$context.menu, text=$text, icon=38, returnvalue='change', hotkey=null, disabled=[FALSE] $text = read text: page=[Page.QMenus] id=120210 add context menu entry: menu=$context.menu, text=$text, icon=66, returnvalue='delete', hotkey=null, disabled=[FALSE] $read.text = read text: page=[Page.Menus] id=1104500 $text = get command name: command=$cmd add context menu global info line: menu=$context.menu, name=$read.text, value=$text $read.text = read text: page=6020 id=272 $text = $table.cmds[$cmd] do if $text == 'global.profile' $text = read text: page=6020 id=279 add context menu global info line: menu=$context.menu, name=$read.text, value=$text
$ret = create menu return value: context menu, id=$cmd, menu=$context.menu, dynamic=[FALSE] add custom menu item to array $menu: text=$text.col returnvalue=$ret end end end
set menu option: $menu, icon=$ICON set menu option: $menu, remove main header=[TRUE] set menu option: $menu, global hotkey=[Key.Identity], id='info' set menu option: $menu, global hotkey=[Key.SectorMap], id='sector' set menu option: $menu, global hotkey=[Key.GalaxyMap], id='galaxy' set menu option: $menu, input context=[Context.Property]
$read.text = read text: page=1904 id=1027 $text = read text: page=35 id=1104507 $flags = [Callback.Switch] $input = create input: id='menu.blacklist' menu=$menu title=$read.text description=$text callback=$flags endsub
sub.GetProfileData: if $current.profile $current.profile.data = $blacklst.profiles[$current.profile] $blacklist.type = $current.profile.data[0] $blacklst.race.table = $current.profile.data[1] $sector.table = $current.profile.data[2] else $blacklist.type = get race blacklist type $sector.table = get sector blacklist table end endsub
sub.CreateProfile: $blacklist.type = get race blacklist type $blacklst.race.table = table alloc $a.races = get race array $a.races = convert array to table: $a.races, increment=[FALSE] $sub.key = get next key: table=$a.races key=null while $sub.key $sub.type = get race blacklist: race=$sub.key $blacklst.race.table[$sub.key] = $sub.type $sub.key = get next key: table=$a.races key=$sub.key end $table = get sector blacklist table $table = clone table $table $data = create new array, size=3, elements=$blacklist.type, $blacklst.race.table, $table, null, null, null, null, null endsub
sub.SelectProfileMenu: $menu = create custom menu array
$ret = create menu return value: callback, value='global.profile' $read.text = read text: page=6020 id=279 add custom menu item to array $menu: text=$read.text returnvalue=$ret
if $blacklst.profiles if size of table $blacklst.profiles add section to custom menu: $menu
$sorted.array = sort table keys: table=$blacklst.profiles $size = size of array $sorted.array $i = 0 while $i < $size $profile = $sorted.array[$i] inc $i = $ret = create menu return value: callback, value=$profile add custom menu item to array $menu: text=$profile returnvalue=$ret end end end
set menu option: $menu, icon=$ICON
$read.text = read text: page=[Page.CmdConsole] id=138 if $sub.title $input = create input: id='bl.select.menu' menu=$menu title=$read.text description=$sub.title callback=null $sub.title = null else if $a.obj -> exists $input = create input: id='bl.select.menu' menu=$menu title=$read.text description=$a.obj callback=null else $input = create input: id='bl.select.menu' menu=$menu title=$read.text description=null callback=null end endsub
sub.DeleteMenu: $menu = create custom menu array
if not $blacklst.profiles $text = read text: page=1903 id=1018 add non selectable menu item: $menu, text=$text else if not size of table $blacklst.profiles $text = read text: page=1903 id=1018 add non selectable menu item: $menu, text=$text else $sorted.array = sort table keys: table=$blacklst.profiles $size = size of array $sorted.array $i = 0 while $i < $size $profile = $sorted.array[$i] inc $i = $ret = create menu return value: callback, value=$profile add custom menu item to array $menu: text=$profile returnvalue=$ret end end
set menu option: $menu, icon=$ICON
$text = read text: page=1903 id=1504 $read.text = read text: page=1903 id=1012 $input = create input: id='bl.delete.menu' menu=$menu title=$read.text description=$text callback=null
endsub
return null
